input.label: Hi ! Welcome to Nepal Rice Weed Survey form. Kindly read the instructions carefully for each question before you fill in. Thank you !

select1.label: Select land type of the rice field
Select soil type of the rice field

input.label: Enter transplanting or seeding date of rice
Number of hills in sampled area

select.label: Select all weed grasses found in Quadrate 1
Select all broad leaf weed found in Quadrate 1

input.label: Number / count of Unidentified broad leaf 1
Number / count of Unidentified broad leaf 2
Number / count of Unidentified broad leaf 3

select.label: Select all sedge leaf weed found in Quadrate 1
Select all weed grasses found in Quadrate 2
Select all broad leaf weed found in Quadrate 2

input.label: Number / count of Unidentified broad leaf 1
Number / count of Unidentified broad leaf 2
Number / count of Unidentified broad leaf 3

select.label: Select all sedge leaf weed found in Quadrate 2
Select all weed grasses found in Quadrate 3

input.hint: Make sure the accuracy is less than 10 meters
